overview: In a game that everyone seems to play, one man decides to make a power move. Richard is finally at his most awaited moment and is torn between playing it safe or risking everything to experience full satisfaction. With the conservative guidance of his brother Eugene and the carefree advice of his buddy Benjoclashing in his head, Richard is confused on how will he proceed with his "Pers Taym" moments.
title: Taym Pers, Pers Taym
